roadmaps.shortDescription: Web front-end developers build website interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create engaging user experiences.

skills.name: HTML
skills.description: HTML (Hypertext Markup Language) is used to create the structure and content of a web page.

skills.name: CSS
skills.description: CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is used to style and layout web pages.

skills.name: JavaScript
skills.description: JavaScript is used to make web pages interactive and dynamic.

roadmaps.shortDescription: Blockchain developers use blockchain technology to build decentralized applications for secure and transparent data management.

skills.name: Solidity
skills.description: Solidity is a contract-oriented programming language used for writing smart contracts on the Ethereum blockchain.

skills.name: Ethereum
skills.description: Ethereum is a blockchain platform that allows developers to build decentralized applications.

skills.name: Hyperledger Fabric
skills.description: Hyperledger Fabric is a blockchain platform for enterprise applications, allowing developers to build secure and scalable blockchain solutions.

roadmaps.shortDescription: Game server developers create the backend infrastructure and architecture for online multiplayer games, handling tasks such as player matchmaking, data storage, and game logic.

skills.name: C++
skills.description: C++ is a high-performance programming language used in game development for its speed and memory management capabilities.

skills.name: Unreal Engine
skills.description: Unreal Engine is a game engine developed by Epic Games, commonly used in game development for its powerful graphics rendering and game development tools.

skills.name: Network Programming
skills.description: Network programming involves designing and implementing communication protocols between computer programs to enable data exchange over networks.

roadmaps.shortDescription: White hat hackers are ethical hackers who specialize in finding vulnerabilities and securing computer systems against potential attacks.

skills.name: Penetration Testing
skills.description: Penetration testing is a method of evaluating the security of a computer system or network by simulating an attack from a malicious source.

skills.name: Python
skills.description: Python is a popular programming language used in cybersecurity for its ease of use, readability, and vast libraries of modules and packages.

skills.name: Vulnerability Assessment
skills.description: Vulnerability assessment is the process of identifying and assessing security vulnerabilities in computer systems or networks.

roadmaps.shortDescription: Full stack web developers are proficient in both front-end and back-end web development, enabling them to build complete web applications.

skills.name: HTML
skills.description: HTML is the markup language used to structure content on the web.

skills.name: CSS
skills.description: CSS is the style sheet language used to add visual styling to HTML content.

skills.name: JavaScript
skills.description: JavaScript is the programming language used to add interactivity to web pages.

skills.name: Node.js
skills.description: Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform JavaScript runtime environment used to build scalable and fast network applications.

skills.name: React
skills.description: React is a JavaScript library used to build user interfaces and single-page applications.

skills.name: MongoDB
skills.description: MongoDB is a NoSQL document database used to store data for web applications.

roadmaps.shortDescription: Artificial Intelligence Engineers design and develop intelligent systems and algorithms that can learn from and make decisions based on data.

skills.name: Python
skills.description: One of the most popular programming languages used in AI development.

skills.name: Machine Learning
skills.description: The ability of computers to learn from data and make decisions.

skills.name: Deep Learning
skills.description: A subset of machine learning that uses artificial neural networks to model and solve complex problems.

roadmaps.shortDescription: Mobile App Developers design and develop applications for mobile devices such as smartphones and tablets, using programming languages and frameworks optimized for mobile platforms.

skills.name: Java
skills.description: One of the most popular programming languages used in Android development.

skills.name: Swift
skills.description: The programming language used to develop iOS applications.

skills.name: Flutter
skills.description: A mobile app SDK for building high-performance, high-fidelity, apps for iOS and Android, from a single codebase.

roadmaps.shortDescription: Cloud Solutions Architects design and implement cloud-based solutions for businesses, using a combination of technical and business skills to ensure that the solutions meet the needs of the organization.

skills.name: Amazon Web Services
skills.description: A widely used cloud platform offering a broad range of services, including compute, storage, and database services.

skills.name: Azure
skills.description: A cloud platform provided by Microsoft, offering a wide range of services for computing, storage, and networking.

skills.name: Python
skills.description: A popular programming language used in cloud computing due to its ease of use and versatility.

roadmaps.shortDescription: DevOps Engineers work to streamline the development and deployment processes of software applications, using automation and collaboration tools to reduce errors and increase efficiency.

skills.name: Jenkins
skills.description: An open-source automation server used to build, test, and deploy software applications.

skills.name: Docker
skills.description: A platform used to develop, ship, and run applications as containers.

skills.name: Bash
skills.description: A shell scripting language used to automate tasks in a Unix-based environment.
